name: Pew Pew Arrgh
description:
Pew! Pew! Arrgh... is a first-person zombie wave-based survival shooter, the goal is to kill all the zombies, either alone or with up to 3 friends, with more coming every wave. 
Pew! Pew! Arrgh... is a tech demo created for the Photon Quantum Networking engine made with Unity. The source code (Quantum + Unity) is fully documented and freely available to any Quantum Developer.

N.B.: The tech demo runs on European servers. Region selection has not been made available in the current version.

You can follow all ATeamOfSorts projects at https://ateamofsorts.com/.

For more information on Photon Quantum, visit:
https://www.photonengine.com/quantum
